title: E*Trade Could Be a Takeover Target. Why the Big Brokers Might Pass.
text:
Discount brokers have cut their commissions to zero, and that is sending their stocks lower. One analyst is now speculating about whether it makes sense for larger established brokers to buy one player on the cheap.

Of the three discount brokers, E*Trade (ticker: ETFC) is arguably the most interesting candidate for an acquisition from an outside buyer. At Charles Schwab (SCHW) commissions make up a small percentage of revenue; the company’s bank is a much bigger driver. TD Ameritrade (AMTD) is still closely tied to TD Bank,...
